contextual_adaptation.reasoning: The translation fails to adapt to the original context and purpose of a conversational podcast explaining AI concepts. The explanatory nature of the original text is lost, making it impossible to convey the original message or intent to the target audience.

information_completeness.reasoning: This is the most critical failure point. A significant portion of the original text's information is either omitted entirely, replaced with internal processing comments, or incorrectly translated into English. evaluation.overall_comment: The translation is fundamentally flawed and unusable. It suffers from pervasive omissions, the insertion of internal model thoughts/comments, and segments translated into the wrong language (English). This catastrophic lack of completeness and accuracy makes the text incomprehensible, failing to convey almost any of the original meaning or technical explanations. It does not meet any standard of translation quality.
